name: NSTextBlock.Layer
desc: The following constants specify values used by the properties and methods contentWidthValueType, setWidth(_:type:for:edge:), setWidth(_:type:for:), width(for:edge:), and widthValueType(for:edge:) to specify text block layer values.

items.name: case padding
items.desc: Padding of the text block: space surrounding the content area extending to the border.

items.name: case border
items.desc: The border of the text block.

items.name: case margin
items.desc: Margin of the text block: space surrounding the border.
